question: 請求
sourceMnemonic: You <kanji>request</kanji> then you <kanji>request</kanji> again. This is starting to turn into more of a <vocabulary>demand</vocabulary> if you ask me. Also can refer to a <vocabulary>claim</vocabulary> or a <vocabulary>charge</vocabulary> as well.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
